card.name: Crackling Eel
card.text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, this creature deals damage equal to its power to that player.

card.name: Grandir, the Storm-Bodied
card.text: Flash You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each card you discarded this turn. When you do, Grandir deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards you drew this way.

card.name: Ka'bi, the Bloomhoof
card.text: Trample When Ka'bi enters, sacrifice any number of lands. Then for each land card in your graveyard, search your library and/or graveyard for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Ava, Thorny Diva
card.text: Overwhelm — Whenever Ava becomes tapped, add {G}. If you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater, add {G}{G} instead. You don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

card.name: Crossbone Cove Cutter
card.text: Menace Whenever this Vehicle attacks, you lose 1 life and draw a card. If this Vehicle was crewed 5 or greater this turn, you lose 3 and draw three cards instead. Crew 1

card.name: Superb Salvage
card.text: Return target nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with a salvage counter on it. It gains "When this permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to the battlefield tapped."

card.name: Mistcutter Attendant
card.text: Vigilance When this creature enters, return up to one other target nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If a permanent was returned this way, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Jahan's Pets
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {3}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Cephalid Strategist
card.text: Whenever this creature becomes tapped, untap up to two other target artifacts and/or creatures you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Abyssal Sea-Witch
card.text: Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Reckless Innovator
card.text: Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, this creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Lava Flow Hellbender
card.text: Trample, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, mill two cards, then this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each land card in your graveyard.

card.name: Riding Turtle
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, untap another target creature you control with lesser toughness. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn.

card.name: Surly Maintainer
card.text: When this creature enters, return up to one target artifact you control or artifact card in your graveyard to your hand. {4}: Create a 1/1 white Sailor artifact creature token with "This token crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater."

card.name: Chordatan Bloodseeker
card.text: Menace Whenever you draw a card except the first one you draw each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Hungering Greatleech
card.text: When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, you draw two cards and you gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

card.name: Relentless Reconstructionist
card.text: When this creature enters, exile up to one target artifact card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card except it's a 3/3 Construct creature in addition to its other types.

card.name: Tyrant Territory
card.text: Permanent spells you cast with mana value 5 or greater cost {1} less to cast. Mature costs you pay cost {1} less. Whenever a permanent you control with mana value 5 or greater enters or a creature you control matures, draw a card.

card.name: Sunvine Nurturer
card.text: Vigilance When this creature enters, you gain 1 life and you draw a card.

card.name: Steelfin Dolphin
card.text: Vigilance Whenever this creature attacks, untap up to one other target artifact or creature.

card.name: Skyskimmer Glaucus
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature enters or attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn. Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Goldseeker Cruiser
card.text: Vigilance Whenever another artifact enters under your control, if this Vehicle isn't a creature, it becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Mercurial Skyrod
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Sea Witch's Wards
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may embrace. (To embrace, tap two artifacts and/or creatures you control) Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. If you embraced as you cast this spell, counter that spell instead.

card.name: Titanic Haruspicy
card.text: Draw two cards Overwhelm — If you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater, draw three cards instead.

card.name: Observant Osprey
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Abyssal Tempter
card.text: When this creature enters, you may pay 2 life. If you do, you draw a card and create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Deadman's Tales
card.text: Overwhelm — Surveil 2. If you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater, surveil 4 instead. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

card.name: Inktrench Stinger
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever this creature enters or attacks, another target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn. Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Noxious Venting
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If an artifact you controlled left the battlefield this turn, that creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Overloaded Cannonship
card.text: When this Vehicle enters, it deals 6 damage to target creature you don't control. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Powderkeg Explosion
card.text: Powderkeg Explosion deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature or planeswalker dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Expedition Funding
card.text: When this artifact enters or leaves the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Bursting Vein Serpent
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, it deals 3 damage to each opponent. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Elemental's Flourish
card.text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. Put a +1/+1 counter on the creature you control if there are two or more land cards in your graveyard. Then those creatures fight. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Mosstusk Guardian
card.text: Trample, ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Quaking Tunneler
card.text: When this creature enters, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment with mana value equal to or less than this creature's power.

card.name: Give In to Instinct
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Cogwork Ichthyoid
card.text: {1}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only once each turn. {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Research Vessel
card.text: When this Vehicle enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Uncovered Pitfall
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Destroy target creature without flying. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Deckhand's Blade
Stormbelt Serpent
card.text: This creature can't be blocked if you've drawn two or more cards this turn.

card.name: Explosive Rage
card.text: Target creature you control gets +3/+2 until end of turn. If there are two or more land cards in your graveyard, that creature gains first strike and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Propagated Bioship
card.text: When this Vehicle enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
